title: 25-Minute Pomodoro Focus Session
description: Use the Pomodoro Technique for focused work periods followed by short breaks
instructions:
1. Choose one specific task to work on
2. Set timer for 25 minutes
3. Work focused on that task only - no distractions
4. When timer rings, take a 5-minute break
5. After 4 pomodoros, take a 15-30 minute break
6. Track completed pomodoros for motivation

title: Daily Time Blocking
description: Block out specific time periods for different types of work and activities
instructions:
1. Review your tasks and priorities for tomorrow
2. Estimate time needed for each task
3. Block out specific time slots in your calendar
4. Include buffer time between blocks
5. Color-code different types of work
6. Stick to your blocks but adjust if needed
